QuestData.Title: Clingy
QuestData.Description: <A miniscule elemental seems to have taken a liking to you.>$B$BCaris... carstr... crystal? <Pebble looks up at you expectantly.>$B$B<You did notice a very large crystal formation towards the middle of the Shuddering Spires. Perhaps you should take him there?>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Pebble to the large crystal formation in the Shuddering Spires.
QuestData.RewardText: <The stones in Pebble's body bounce up and down happily. He seems very appreciative.>
